title: How Riven Mains See Their Games

replies.body: Dont you mean riven in general? you dont have to be a main to close your eyes and spam Q

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oK3cjW7P,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-21T09:09:54.099+0000)
>
> Dont you mean riven in general? you dont have to be a main to close your eyes and spam Q

Aye what is your main account? Would I remember you from the old forums?

anyone who plays riven is automatically a riven main for the remainder of the match
